features: 【5000 Rechageable Fan Super Long 32H Working Time】The Portable Handheld Fan can work continuously for 6-32 hours. The huge battery capacity and long working time provide convenience for your outdoor activities or travel.

【Powerful & Ultra Quiet 5 Speed Portable Fan】Do you want to have more speed wind choice in different condition? EasyAcc Portable Fan with 5 speed will satisfy your need. This personal fan's noise lower than other 99% handheld fan on Amazon. Quiet and different speed fit for sleeping, reading, working, travel etc in home, office or outdoor.

【Emergecy Powerbank- Charging for your phone】This Handheld Fan can also work as powerbank, it can charge for your mobile phone durring outdoor activites on emergency.And with newly TYPE-C charging port for faster charging speed, only 5 hours can be fully charged.
【LED Battery Level Indicator】Comes with digital display, you can see the remaining power easily and timely, avoid sudden power off. EasyAcc make life convenient and easy.
【180° Foldable Multipurpose Design 3 in 1 Fan】The Hand Held fan can Fold into 180° work as different fan. ① Small Desk Fan, ② Hand Fan, take it for outdoor, ③ hang on neck to free your hand.

【What Make EasyAcc Different】There are several model of handheld fan with LED on Amazon, but there are some different in details. ① Material, we adopt advanced ABS material better quality, color looks more advanced, more durable. ② The handle is more ergonomic, hold it more comfortable. ③ The Lanyard to wear more smoothly and comfortable. EasyAcc is worth to trust.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EasyAcc Portable HandHeld Fan, 5000mAh 32H Rechargable Personal Fan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hot Flash Answer and More!
reviews.reviewText: I was miserable with hot flashes. I had tried many other fans before. The others all had something wrong with them-too noisy, too much air, too little air, not stable, didn't hold charge. Then I found this perfect fan! Quiet - actually silent on lower settings. Lots of choices from gentle, gentle breeze to strong flow! My new best friend fan lulls me to sleep on the gentle breeze setting and keeps me cool all night. Switched to a higher setting, it takes away the discomfort of a full blown daytime hot flash in an instant. Recharge lasts a long, long time (10 nights at least) and, if I want, I can just add a USB plug and it goes forever! I carry one with me at all times, charged and ready to go. Conveniently, it tells me how much power I have left! I bought one, then another! In that way, I can charge one and carry it with me, while the other waits at home, fully charged, ready to substitute for the first when I need to switch them out. It worked so well, I've bought several more tao put away for the future. It gives me so much pleasure, my husband decided to try it. Now, he has his own and loves it as much as I. A++++++++++++ and so much more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product is great and a life saver. I was traveling and struggling with my hot flash, ordered it and had it delivered to my hotel. I now have this with me all the time. Battery last a long time, easy to charge, and love that I can recharge it rather than use batteries. The 5 levels of fan speed is fantastic, level one and two are sufficient but when I'm outside having level five is absolutely amazing. Level 1 is great during meetings, quiet enough that it doesn't disturb the meeting at all. Highly recommend purchasing, great gift for anyone you know that has hot flash or gets hot easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For someone who internal oven is starting to turn on and off a little more. This fan is wonderful when you want to cool off. Highest speed gives a nice gust of wind. It has a light humming sound but it's barely noticable. Fits nicely in a handbag! Wrists straps are a nice addition. I would purchase again. Great as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and Powerful & Portable
reviews.reviewText: The fan is powerful and quiet even at the fifth speed. The straps make it convenient to be placed around the neck for hands-free transportation. When placed on a table or stand the effect can be felt from 2 ft. away even at the first level. The impact can be felt even from a distance greater than 2 ft. as you increase the levels of intensity. The battery life is commendable as even with constant usage throughout the day there is still battery life left in the evening. I did note that when it is being recharged, the battery monitor shows 99% for a long time before it shows 100%. Nevertheless, this is not a major concern.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Battery Fan,EasyAcc Rechargeable Fan with LG 2600mA Battery
reviews.reviewText: I bought this Battery Fan ,EasyAcc Rechargeable Fan with LG 2600mA Battery at the end of this past June. This is an amazing little fan. I wish I would have had one all of my my life but I just recently discovered it on Amazon.I can carry it all over the house with me and it's happy wherever I set it down. On a really hot day (like we've been having lately) I even carry it to the bathroom to use while I'm sitting there. It's nice to keep that breeze going.Tonight as I write this review I have it blowing on my internet modem to keep it cool.When I received my fan and discovered that I liked it so much I sent 2 of them to a friend. She keeps one on her computer table and one on her bed's nightstand.The main reason I bought the first fan is because in the Summer we usually get a lot of power outages; so I figured this time around for this Summer I would have a battery powered fan on hand for when the power goes out and it's 95 degrees so I could get a bit of relief from the heat.EasyAcc to the rescue! LOL.At the same time I ordered this fan I also ordered the EasyAcc Mini Handheld Fan USB Desk Fan with 4000mAh Rechargeable Battery Operated 23Hours 3 Speeds; which by the way is also a very impressive little fan and blows a very good breeze and is ultra-portable, but with it's 4000 mah battery it does NOT skimp on wind power or runtime.It's small enough to carry along anywhere; even in your purse if you carry one.So now I have 2 EasyAcc battery fans with extended runtimes so at least now I am sure to have some comfort this Summer when the lights go out. (They always do.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just purchased this not long ago, but has worked great so far. I like the fact it has five speeds, and it can fold to sit on a table as well as charge my phone pretty quickly when tried. I shared the link with my friends to go out dancing with me at the outdoor venues we frequent and they are all excited

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Changed My Life
reviews.reviewText: I’m a teacher in Texas and this was a life saver for recess duty during the summer. It has lots of settings and it blows pretty hard on the highest settings. The battery life is really good too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We’ve only had it a month or 2 but so far so good.

Great compact fan that folds up nicely and still has a stand for desk use! Still pretty powerful for the size, and lasts quite a decent amount of time. A must have during hot weather, and the battery percentage display is nice to have as well, compared to other models with lights only.I haven't tested the actual battery capacity but being able to act as a portable battery for a phone is a great feature.One small thing is the strap that comes to hang it around the neck attaches at a weird spot, so you can't really use it hands free to blow onto your face while walking, as it keeps rolling around. Having clip points elsewhere to point at the face would be a nice improvement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I took this fan to Borneo for almost 3 weeks at 30+ degrees and used it most days. It is great. You can adjust the fan speed easily and it displays how much % battery is left. I only recharged it the once during the trip although it did still have 30% to go. Off to Africa next and will be buying another one for my spouse.

Léger et surtout silencieux au plus bas - c'est ce que je recherchais pour pouvoir l'utiliser aux tournois de scrabble sans déranger les autres joueurs. Sa batterie dure très longtemps avant recharge. Parfait !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little fan is my new found AngelEvery menopausal woman needs to have 1 off these in their bag it's small enough to carry around and stops these hot flashes from making us look like we have jumped out the showerSo powerful even on the lowest setting lightweight, quick to charge
Piccolo ventilatore davvero molto utile e funzionale.Diventato ormai indispensabile, per quanto mi riguarda, al lavoro.CONSIGLIATO!
